job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and refinement of AI models, which is the core of the Modeling task.
RAG systems are a specific type of generative AI modeling technique.
LLMs are a fundamental component of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: Implementing and optimizing solutions implies building and deploying them within software systems, aligning with software development.
Vector databases are typically integrated into software systems to support AI applications, thus falling under software development for integration purposes.

job_tasks.phrase: zorgt voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the desired qualities of a modeled system, implying the work involved in achieving them.

job_tasks.phrase: zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the outcome and fine-tuning of models to meet specific requirements, a key aspect of modeling.

soft_skills.phrase: zorgt voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn
zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, implementing, and optimizing generative AI solutions, specifically mentioning LLMs, RAG systems, and vector databases. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer focused on language, vision, and interaction specialists.
